Song.title: Revelation Song
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Jennie Lee Riddle. © 2004 Gateway Create Publishing. CCLI#34312

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [D]Worthy is the [Am7] Lamb Who was slain [C]Holy, Holy is [G]He [D]Sing a new song [Am7] to Him who sits on [C]Heaven’s mercy s[G]eat
CHORUS: [D]Holy, holy, holy [Am7] is the Lord God Almighty [C]Who was and is and is to c[G]ome [D]With all creation I sing, [Am7] praise to the King of kings [C]You are my everything, and [G]I will adore you [D Am7 C G]
VERSE 2: [D]Clothed in rainbows [Am7] of living color [C]Flashes of lighting, roll[G]s of thunder [D]Blessing and honor, strength and [Am7] glory and power be [C]To You the only wise K[G]ing
VERSE 3: [D]Filled with wonder, [Am7] awestruck wonder [C]At the mention of Your [G]name [D]Jesus Your name is power [Am7] breath and living water [C]Such a marv’lous mys - [G]tery yeah
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 worthy is the lamb who was slain holy holy is he sing a new song to him who sits on heavens mercy seat chorus holy holy holy is the lord god almighty who was and is and is to come with all creation i sing praise to the king of kings you are my everything and i will adore you verse 2 clothed in rainbows of living color flashes of lighting rolls of thunder blessing and honor strength and glory and power be to you the only wise king verse 3 filled with wonder awestruck wonder at the mention of your name jesus your name is power breath and living water such a marvlous mys tery yeah
